title: Timeswept Rogue
description: In 1789, fearless sea captain Ramsey O'Keefe needs all his courage when fate catapults him 200 years into the future. While frantically searching for a friend lost at sea, modern-day movie star Penelope Hamilton rescues the stranger from the waters of the Caribbean. Worlds apart, Ramsey and Penelope are irresistibly drawn together by a love that proves limitless in its passion.
author: Amy J. Fetzer
